HomePage.title: Welcome to the MACAQUE™ PROTEIN BARS
HomePage.description: A ready-to-use, i18n-enabled, SSR, and Tailwind-powered starter template with ShadCN components.

HomePageHero.subtitle: THE BEST WAY TO CONSUME YOUR WHEY PROTEIN
HomePageHero.subtext: Forget about traditional shakes. MACAQUE™ PROTEIN BARS deliver 25 grams of premium whey protein in a delicious, customizable format — All built for your goals, traning and grind.
